content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC assistance?
Yeah, I need help with plumbing. Sink is leaking.
I'd be happy to help with your leaking sink. May I have your name to get started with scheduling an appointment?
Thank you, Mike. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm you're in our service area?
Great, you're in our service area. When would you like a plumber to come out? Let me know your ideal time and date.
Actually I'll have to wait. My insurance hasn't approved it yet, so I can't book anything right now.
No problem, Mike. Whenever your insurance is ready and you want to schedule, just let us know—we’ll be happy to help. Is there anything else I can do for you today?
reason: Customer is waiting for insurance approval before scheduling.
